snippet: GUTFREUND--John. The Trustees and staff of The Metropolitan Museum of Art mourn the passing of John Gutfreund, a committed friend and generous donor who, with his wife Susan, has been a longtime Benefactor of the Museum and a supporter of the Department of European Sculpture and Decorative Arts. Most notably, they made significant gifts toward the acquisition of works of art for the department, and their philanthropy also extended to several other areas of the Museum. We send our heartfelt condolences to Susan and to the entire family. Daniel Brodsky, Chairman Thomas P. Campbell, Director and CEO Daniel H. Weiss, President 1/3
